welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kiryas Joel, a charming city known for its close-knit community and rich cultural heritage. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Stewart Airport is dedicated to handling international flights and customs procedures.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orange County Airport, serving regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is the main hub for all domestic and international flights at Westchester County Apt Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights at Westchester County Apt Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
